text: George-Nicolae Simion (born 21 September 1986) is a Romanian politician and activist. He is the founder and chairman of the Alliance for the Union of Romanians (AUR). He is currently a candidate for President of Romania in the 2025 presidential election. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Bucharest Category:Romanian activists Category:Romanian historians Category:Economists
title: George Simion
